attributes.action: Have all atrocities caused by the I.R.A during the troubles investigated.
attributes.additional_details: Kingsmill, prison break, the two soldier who were pulled from a car striped of all there cloths and shot in cold blood and there are many more killing and bombings like those that no justice was brought
attributes.background: The I.R.A caused so many deaths during the troubles and only a very small few of those atrocities caused by them were investigated what im asking for is for the many many more that has been left untouched for all those years to bereopened and investigated fully.
